Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1967...
Injured on 8/6/1975 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/17/1978, off Dave Pagan (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/25/1978, off Rich Hand (MIN)...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1980...
Hit for the cycle against Baltimore on 5/3/1983...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 5/3/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 8/15/1984 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 5/5/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $324,000 per year...
